member.name: T:Microsoft.Activities.Design.ExpressionTranslation.ExpressionTranslator
member.summary: Translates the expressions in a XAML workflow from VB or C# into trees of activities, such that the entire tree is expressed in terms of trusted activities, and no VB or C# is executed at runtime.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Activities.Design.ExpressionTranslation.ExpressionTranslator.GetExpressionActivities(System.Object)
member.summary: Retrieves the specified activity. This method corresponds to a XAML attached property used internally during translation.
member.param: The activity tree to retrieve.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Activities.Design.ExpressionTranslation.ExpressionTranslator.SetExpressionActivities(System.Object,System.Activities.Activity)
member.summary: Sets a value to the specified activity. This method corresponds to a XAML attached property used internally during translation.
member.param: The activity to set the value upon.
The value to set.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Activities.Design.ExpressionTranslation.ExpressionTranslator.Translate(System.IO.TextReader)
member.summary: Translates the expressions of a workflow into trees of activities.
member.returns: The result of the translation () that includes the translated XAML and translation errors (if any).
member.param: The text reader with the input XAML.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Activities.Design.ExpressionTranslation.ExpressionTranslator.Translate(System.IO.TextReader,System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext)
member.summary: Translates the expressions of a workflow into trees of activities.
member.returns: The result of the translation () that includes the translated XAML and translation errors (if any).
member.param: The text reader with the input XAML.
The schema context to be used during translation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Activities.Design.ExpressionTranslation.ExpressionTranslator.Translate(System.IO.TextReader,System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Translates the expressions of a workflow into trees of activities.
member.returns: The result of the translation () that includes the translated XAML and translation errors (if any).
member.param: The text reader with the input XAML.
The schema context to be used during translation.
The path of local assemblies for references in the XAML.
The name of the compiled expression root type. This is used for compiled expressions (e.g. C# support).

member.name: M:Microsoft.Activities.Design.ExpressionTranslation.ExpressionTranslator.Translate(System.Xaml.XamlReader)
member.summary: Translates the expressions of a workflow into trees of activities.
member.returns: The result of the translation () that includes the translated XAML and translation errors (if any).
member.param: The XAML reader with the input XAML.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Activities.Design.ExpressionTranslation.TranslationError
member.summary: An error thrown during expression translation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Activities.Design.ExpressionTranslation.TranslationError.ActivityId
member.summary: The Id of the offending activity
member.returns: Gets the Id of the offending activity

member.name: P:Microsoft.Activities.Design.ExpressionTranslation.TranslationError.EndColumn
member.summary: The end column from the original XAML file where the error happened.
member.returns: Gets the end column from the original XAML file where the error happended.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Activities.Design.ExpressionTranslation.TranslationError.EndLine
member.summary: The end line from the original XAML file where the error happened.
member.returns: Gets the end line from the original XAML file where the error happened.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Activities.Design.ExpressionTranslation.TranslationError.ExpressionText
member.summary: The original VB/C# expression text that produced the error. For example, the VB condition in an If activity (if it can't be translated)
member.returns: Gets the original VB/C# expression text that produced the error.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Activities.Design.ExpressionTranslation.TranslationError.Message
member.summary: The error message (why the translation did not succeed).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Activities.Design.ExpressionTranslation.TranslationError.StartColumn
member.summary: The start column from the original XAML file where the error happened.
member.returns: Gets the start column from the original XAML file where the error happened.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Activities.Design.ExpressionTranslation.TranslationError.StartLine
member.summary: The start line from the original XAML file where the error happened.
member.returns: Gets the start line from the original XAML file where the error happened.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Activities.Design.ExpressionTranslation.TranslationResults
member.summary: Contains the results of translating the expressions of a workflow. These results contain the translated XAML (provided as a XamlReader) and the set of errors (if any) from the expression translation operation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Activities.Design.ExpressionTranslation.TranslationResults.Errors
member.summary: The set of errors from the translation operation. Errors include the message and information about the offending activity within the original xaml file.
member.returns: Gets the set of errors from the translation operation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Activities.Design.ExpressionTranslation.TranslationResults.Output
member.summary: The translated xaml (a xaml where all the VB/C# expressions have been translated to trees of trusted activities)
